// Registers:
//
//   Name                         Reg   Size
//   ---------------------------- ----- ----
//   UniformPixelVector_0         c0       1
//   ScreenPositionScaleBias      c1       1

//   DiffuseOverrideParameter     c4       1
//   SpecularOverrideParameter    c5       1
//   UniformPixelVector_1         c8       1
//   UniformPixelVector_2         c9       1
//   UniformPixelVector_3         c10      1
//   UniformPixelScalars_2        c11      1
//   LightColorAndFalloffExponent c12      1
//   UpperSkyColor                c13      1
//   LowerSkyColor                c14      1
//   AmbientColorAndSkyFactor     c15      1
//   SceneColorTexture            s0       1
//   PixelTexture2D_0             s1       1
//

    ps_3_0
    def c3, 1.5, 3, 0.75, 2
    def c6, 0.5, -0.5, -9.99999997e-007, 15
    def c7, 0, 2, 1, 1.5
    def c16, 1.20000005, 0, 0, 0
    dcl_texcoord3 v0.xyz
    dcl_texcoord4 v1
    dcl_texcoord6 v2.xyz
    dcl_texcoord7 v3.xyz
    dcl_texcoord5 v4.xyw
    dcl_texcoord v5.xy
    dcl_2d s0
    dcl_2d s1

def c220, 0, 1, 0.0625, 0.5
dcl_2d s15

// Unreal Engine SceneColorTexture halo fix inserted with DarkStarSword's shadertool.py:
// shadertool.py -i --fix-unreal-halo-sct --only-autofixed --stereo-sampler-ps=s15 CRC32_418EF025_1070.txt
mov r30.xyw, v4
texldl r31, c220.z, s15
add r31.w, r30.w, -r31.y
mad r30.x, r31.w, r31.x, r30.x

    rcp r0.x, r30.w
    mul r0.xy, r0.x, r30
    mad r0.xy, r0, c1, c1.wzzw
    mov r0.zw, c7.x
    texldl r0, r0, s0
    mov r1.zw, c7
    add r0.x, r1.z, -c2.y
    add r0.x, -r0.x, r0.w
    rcp r0.x, r0.x
    mad r0.x, -c2.x, r0.x, -r30.w
    rcp r0.y, c11.z
    mul_sat r0.x, r0.y, r0.x
    mad r0.yz, v5.xxyw, r1.w, c9.xxyw
    texld r2, r0.yzzw, s1
    mul r0.y, r2_abs.w, r2_abs.w
    mul r0.y, r0.y, r0.y
    mul r0.y, r0.y, r2_abs.w
    add r0.z, r2_abs.w, c6.z
    cmp r0.y, r0.z, r0.y, c7.x
    mov r3, c3
    mad r0.zw, v5.xyxy, r3, c10.xyxy
    texld r4, r0.zwzw, s1
    mul r0.z, r4_abs.w, r4_abs.w
    mul r0.z, r0.z, r0.z
    mul r0.z, r0.z, r4_abs.w
    add r0.w, r4_abs.w, c6.z
    add r1.xyw, r2.xyzz, r4.xyzz
    cmp r0.z, r0.w, r0.z, c7.x
    lrp r2.x, r0.y, r0.z, r0.y
    dp3 r0.y, v2, v2
    rsq r0.y, r0.y
    mad r0.z, v2.z, -r0.y, c7.z
    mul r2.yzw, r0.y, v2.xxyz
    cmp r0.y, r2.w, r0_abs.z, c7.z
    mad r2.yzw, r2.w, c7.xxxy, -r2
    add r0.z, r0.y, c6.z
    pow r3.z, r0.y, c16.x
    cmp r0.y, r0.z, r3.z, c7.x
    add r0.y, r0.y, c11.y
    mad r0.x, r0.y, r0.x, r2.x
    add r0.y, -r2_abs.y, c7.z
    mul_pp oC0.w, r0.y, r0.x
    nrm_pp r0.xyz, v0
    dp3_sat_pp r0.x, r2.yzww, r0
    mov_sat_pp r0.y, r0.z
    pow_pp r2.x, r0.x, c6.w
    add r0.x, r0.x, c6.z
    mul_pp r2.xyz, r2.x, c5
    cmp_pp r0.xzw, r0.x, r2.xyyz, c7.x
    mad r2.xy, v5, r3, c8
    texld r2, r2, s1
    add r1.xyw, r1, r2.xyzz
    add r2.xyz, r1.z, -c0
    mul_pp r1.xyz, r1.xyww, r2
    mad_pp r1.xyz, r1, c4.w, c4
    mul r2.xyz, r0.y, r1
    add r0.y, r0.y, c6.z
    cmp r2.xyz, r0.y, r2, c7.x
    add_pp r0.xyz, r0.xzww, r2
    dp3 r0.w, v3, v3
    rsq r0.w, r0.w
    mul r0.w, r0.w, v3.z
    mad r2.xy, r0.w, c6, c6.x
    mul r2.xy, r2, r2
    mul r2.yzw, r1.xxyz, r2.y
    mul r3.xyz, r1, r2.x
    mul r2.xyz, r2.yzww, c14
    mad r2.xyz, r3, c13, r2
    mov_pp r0.w, c15.w
    mad_pp r2.xyz, r2, r0.w, c0
    mad_pp r0.xyz, r0, c12, r2
    mad_pp r0.xyz, r1, c15, r0
    mad_pp oC0.xyz, r0, v1.w, v1

// approximately 80 instruction slots used (5 texture, 75 arithmetic)
